info.title: Simple API for SyntaxNet
info.description: Allows to do HTTP request to execute NLP processing using SyntaxNet

post.summary: Executes the full parsing pipeline against Parsey Universal

parameters.name: Content-Language
parameters.description: The language to return the entity in. Could be bg, cs, da, hr, el, en, es, et, eu, fi, fr, gl, grc, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, la, nl, no, pl, pt, sl, sv or zh

200.description: The parsing result in the CoNLL-U format http://universaldependencies.org/format.html

400.description: Bad request, usually because the Content-Language is not supported
